archimate:Requirement.name: PM.1.4.1e: e) providing secure deployment of business applications (e.g. using a virtual desktop or a sandbox to separate business-related applications and data from personal applications and data)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
